body_html:
Hi! Look a little earlier at the instructions, the first section is about loading the MNIST data. And you need to run the following before your snippet of code above:

from tensorflow.examples.tutorials.mnist import input_data
mnist = input_data.read_data_sets('MNIST_data', one_hot=True)
body_text:
Hi! Look a little earlier at the instructions, the first section is about loading the MNIST data. And you need to run the following before your snippet of code above:
from tensorflow.examples.tutorials.mnist import input_data
mnist = input_data.read_data_sets('MNIST_data', one_hot=True)
body:
Hi! Look a little earlier at the instructions, the first section is about loading the MNIST data. And you need to run the following before your snippet of code above:

```
from tensorflow.examples.tutorials.mnist import input_data
mnist = input_data.read_data_sets('MNIST_data', one_hot=True)
```
